Post.content:
Vue

1.Vue(hook)
  • beforeCreate
  • Created
  • BeforeMount
  • Mounted
  • BeforeUpdate
  • Updated
  • BeforeDestroy
  • Destroyed

: BeforeMount$el

2.Vue
  • v-on(:@): <div v-on:click="submit" @click="submit"></div>
  • v-bind(: :): <div v-bind:dataA="dataA" :dataA="dataA"></div>
  • v-text: <div v-text="123"></div> jQuery$('div').text('123')
  • v-html: <div v-html="<a href="aa">"></div> jQuery$('div').html('<a href="aa">')
  • v-if(v-else,v-else-if): true(v-if,,) <div v-if="data"></div>
  • v-show: true(v-showtruefalse) <div v-show="data"></div>
  • v-for: ,:key, <div v-for="array||Object"></div>
  • v-model: <input v-model="dataA" />
3.

  • ()

    bind

    inserted ()

    update VNode VNode ()

    componentUpdated VNode VNode

    unbind

  • el DOM

  • binding

    • name v-
    • valuev-my-directive=1 + 1 2
    • oldValue update componentUpdated
    • expression v-my-directive=1 + 1 1 + 1
    • arg v-my-directive:foo foo
    • modifiersv-my-directive.foo.bar { foo: true, bar: true }

  • vnodeVue

  • oldVnode update componentUpdated

4.

tip: ,Vuex

5.: dataDom
6.v-modelvue
